subject: Awaiting a delivery
description_text:
Hi, I ordered a handbrake from you guys on the 25th of October, my order still says ‘processing, and for some reason it doesn’t let me track my parcel very clearly. 
I have ordered from you guys in the past and I’ve never had to wait this long for delivery that’s why I’m querying this. 

Please reply asap as it’s a present. 

Chloe 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Chloe Anniss,    We apologize for the inconvenience. This product is currently out of stock and is expected to be restocked and shipped by next Monday.

Hi, 
I’m just making sure that this item is now back in stock and has now been shipped to me? And if so, when it is expected to arrive please. 

Chloe 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Chloe Anniss,      Your parcel has now been dispatched and is expected to arrive around the 27th. We sincerely apologise for the delay and inconvenience caused.
